name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Sheets Assistant - For Excel & Sheets

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate formulas and receive explanations with AI for Excel and Google Sheets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you want to generate spreadsheet formulas with ease? Are you having trouble understanding complex formulas? We have built the AI Sheets Assistant for this exact purpose! 

Simply provide it with an explanation of what you are trying to do and it will generate a formula. Or you can provide it with a formula and it will tell you what it does. It works for both Microsoft Excel and Google Sheets and you don't even have to leave the website to use it!

Features:
- Generate formulas
- Get explanations of formulas
- Works for both Microsoft Excel and Google Sheets
- Access directly from the website without having to leave your spreadsheet
- Quick and easy to use
- Fast and friendly support
- Free to start

If you are wanting to generate or understand formulas in Microsoft Excel or Google Sheets then the AI Sheets Assistant is for you!
